pr_title: Fix cancel button in Edit features with feature-linked annotation

timeline.bodyText: Perhaps it's possible to return false here. That way we can convert the type Optional<Boolean> to just Boolean.
timeline.author: JonLavi

replies.bodyText: Dialog.showAndWait() returns an Optional, so I don't think I can use a Boolean.
replies.author: sclaridge

timeline.author: JonLavi
Rachael-E
